nodes.bodyText: I feel like it might fix more bugs if we simply actually create multiple stacks with proper stack sizes instead of our NBT hacky thing
That's what I did in this PR =P I removed the NBT hacky thing and just copyed the stack and adjusted the size.
yeah but you're setting it to 1, it'd never go over?
Yeah we send the amount extra.
..... I am not sure this is the right approach here.....
It's because we sometimes send more than the max stacksize, we have to send the amount and the stack we want to send separate.
